descriptionHtml:
================================================
[color=#b6d7a8]DO NOT REUPLOAD THIS MOD TO OTHER SITES WITHOUT MY PERMISSION. IF YOU WANT TO SHARE OR USE MY FILES, CONTACT ME FIRST![/color]
================================================
================================================

Skyrim Special Edition notes:

I've got several requests to port my mods to SSE and consoles. 
I have to say that I don't own SSE, I don't own any current-gen console, so none of my mods will be ever ported to SSE by me or someone else.

================================================
[color=#b6d7a8]Description:[/color]

Lore-friendly hair mod for those who miss mediaeval entourage.
Actually, this is my first hair mod ever, so expect troubles.
Everything was created from the scratch with Skyrim in mind.

================================================
[color=#b6d7a8]Known issues:[/color]
- Hairs fit elves mostly.
- Hairs CLIP with face, this isn't a bug, this is normal. I'll make morphs later.
- Hairs may CLIP with armor. There's nothing I can do. That's inevitable. All is vain (c) - Tetrodoxin
- Hairs are not perfect, there are lots of issues because I have never created anything like this before. 
================================================
[color=#b6d7a8]Installation:[/color]

Place SC_hairs.esp file, textures and meshes folders into Data folder.

================================================
[color=#b6d7a8]Uninstallation:[/color]

Remove SC_hairs.esp and SC folder in Meshes and Textures.

================================================
[color=#b6d7a8]Mods in screenshots:[/color]

ENB:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/] Snapdragon ENB - All-Is-Vain ENB by tetrodoxin
[/url]
CLOTHES:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69007/?] Witcher 3 Yennefer and Triss armors by zzjay[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39922/?] Elven Dresses by Naihaan by Naihaan Kragnaidael[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70241/?] Outcast Shen Armor and weapon by NewerMind43 [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53518/?] Fluffy Travel Attire by Kalilies[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49178/?]SC - Noble Dresses by ShinglesCat [/url]
Morrigan's ballgown is still a wip.

CHARACTERS:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68453/] Braenn by Azeneth[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37372/] Sighne by Azeneth[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71434/] TM RaceMenu Presets - female Altmer Bosmer Dunmer by Aisaka aka TevinterMage[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/] Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNBase - WIP by Zonzai and Seren4XX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/] The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot as LogRaam

[/url][color=#e06666]If you haven't found interesting you mod in this list, it means that mod is private and most likely will not be released ever.[/color]

================================================
[color=#b6d7a8]Frequently Asked Questions:[/color]

Q: Make this *picture*
A: If I like it, you'll possibly see it in the next updates

Q: There are not much hairs compared to other hair mods.
A: I will add more in future, I promise. I already have few in mind.

Q: Why there's only one male hair?
A: Because I don't know what should I do for them. 

Q: HDT-version?
A: Nope. Use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?]KS-HDT[/url] instead. I have no need in hairs with physics. 

================================================
[color=#b6d7a8]Terms of use:[/color]

You are not allowed to reupload this mod to other sites without permission.
You have to ask me first if you want to use any part of this mod in your own such as follower mod, etc.
You are not allowed to publicily share any your modification of this mod, private sharing is allowed though.
You are not allowed to convert these hairs to other games.
If you have any question regarding permission, feel free to ask.

================================================
[color=#b6d7a8]Thanks to/Credits:[/color]

- Tons of thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3902355/?]Azeneth[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19336604/?]Eiskristall7[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1932308/?]Aisaka [/url]and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5355170/]silvericed [/url]for their help and screenshots.
- HUGE thanks to Azeneth for her Braenn and Sighne.
- Thanks to Bioware for the newest Dragon Age game, for inspiration that will never end (I've actually recreated Morrigan's hair, not the exact copy, but still...)
author: ShinglesCat
